For each project created by a user, it is stored in a directory with a name equal to the project name. All projects are stored on the host system and are independent of the Proteus installation. Inside this directory is a *proteus.xml* file, an *objects* directory and, optionally, an *assets* directory. The *objects* directory contains all the documents and objects of the project, each with a unique identifier randomly generated by the system. The *assets* directory contains the resources associated with the project, such as images.
